item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hello There! My name is Praveen Kottarathil; I am an IT Professional based in The Netherlands. I have been working in various parts of the IT Ecosystem, since my first job as a Software Developer and Trainer back in in 2004 and never looked back.

I currently work with ING, on various back-end systems that enable self-service and assisted banking services in 🇳🇱Netherlands & 🇧🇪Belgium. Formerly I was an engineer and subject matter expert at ✈️Emirates where I used to build and operate back-office planning & (mathematical)optimization systems for Emirates Network Control & Operations.

I am @praveenkp on Twitter, @shelldragon on StackOverflow and @PickledDragon on GitHub. My email is basically my first name at last name, followed by the net top-level domain.
